provenance.description: Generation of the Reward Feedback using Plan Executor watchlist

feedback.description: Helloworld domain transition component for feedback_gen feedback contract

action_reward.2021-03-12T12:37:25.989718: If the member has interacted with the intervention, e.g. contacted, enacted upon an action or read a notification

action_reward_dt.2021-03-12T12:37:25.989822: a recorded date time when the recorded interaction occured

action_success.2021-03-12T12:37:25.989905: If the profile has their permissions set favourably for this intervention

feedback_dt.2021-03-12T12:37:25.989985: The date when feedback was recieved

feedback_id.2021-03-12T12:37:25.990118: a unique reference id from the feedback system unique across all feeback batches

inferred_causation.2021-03-12T12:37:25.990236: a confidence value of the inferred causation of the action to the reward

inferred_channel.2021-03-12T12:37:25.990335: The channel from which the observation came

inferred_reward_dt.2021-03-12T12:37:25.990525: The timestamp associated with the inferred reward

plan_id.2021-03-12T12:37:25.990626: temporary modification of the Plan id, taking only one id from the list

reporting_system.2021-03-12T12:37:25.990723: The system that reported the feedback

action_channel.2021-03-18T15:11:44.736906: The channel the action feedback was from
